Software Engineer | Microsoft | Redmond (Seattle), WA | ONSITE

Hi HN,

The OneNote team at Microsoft is hiring for our Customer Insights & Data group!

We're a small, five person team working with petabytes of data and a host of interesting problems. Currently in the early stages of migrating our ETL and analytics systems from our internal BigQuery equivalent to the Hadoop ecosystem, we're keen on hiring people with functional programming experience and/or war stories from the Spark/Kafka/Storm/C* trenches.

Have questions? See the job postings below or email me at nib@microsoft.com!

Software Engineer II: https://aka.ms/cid-swe2-opening

Sr. Software Engineer: https://aka.ms/cid-swe3-opening
